trans-unit.source: The base class used for storing information for a contract operation defined in a workflow service.
When implemented in a derived class, initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.OperationInfoBase"></xref> class.
When implemented in a derived class, creates a deep copy of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.OperationInfoBase"></xref> instance.
The copy of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.OperationInfoBase"></xref> object.
Determines if the specified <xref href="System.object"></xref> is equal to the current instance.
The object to compare with the current instance.
`True` if obj is equal, otherwise `False`.
Returns the full name of the contract that implements this operation.
The service provider associated with this operation.
A string representing the full name of the contract that implements this operation.
Returns the type of the contract associated with this operation.
The service provider associated with this operation.
A <xref href="System.Type"></xref> object representing the type of the contract associated with this operation.
Generates a number corresponding to the value of the object to support the use of a hash table.
An <xref href="System.Int32"></xref> representing the hash code value of the object.
`true` if this operation is one-way, `false` if it is two-way.
The service provider associated with this operation.
`true` if this operation is one-way, `false` if it is two-way.
Gets the <xref href="System.Reflection.MethodInfo"></xref> associated with the operation.
The service provider associated with this operation.
A <xref href="System.Reflection.MethodInfo"></xref> object containing details of the operation.
Gets the collection of parameters associated with the operation.
The service provider associated with this operation.
An <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.OperationParameterInfoCollection"></xref> object containing details about the parameters of the operation.
When implemented in a derived class, gets or sets the name associated with this instance.
A string representing the object's name.
Gets or sets the user name associated with the security context of the operation.
A string representing the user name associated with the security context of the operation.
Gets or sets the user role (e.g. `Administrator`) associated with the security context of the operation.
A string representing the user role associated with the security context of the operation.
